name: Nicholas Harvey
what_you_do: Nicholas Harvey Consulting is a strategic advisement and management consulting practice devoted to building adaptive human-centered cultures in the age of AI.
who_you_serve: C-Suite Executives, Managers, and Leaders; Nonprofit Organizations, Boards, and Executives; Community Engagement Officers; Corporate Social Responsibility Organizations; Social Justice Advocates and Organizations; Public Managers; Leaders of Faith Communities
social_proof: Dr. Nicholas Harvey is the Principal and CEO of Nicholas Harvey Consulting, known as the Leadership and Culture Catalyst. He is a credentialed ICF coach and certified administrator of key intercultural assessments. He holds advanced degrees from Georgia Tech, Emory University, and United Theological Seminary.
signature_programs: NQCLUSIONETICS™, a framework for building equitable, inclusive workplaces, and the Cultural Competency in Coaching Framework
business_focus: Nicholas Harvey Consulting helps corporate leaders create high-performing, human-centered cultures that thrive in the age of AI.
service_provided: Strategic Advisement, Strategic Workforce Development, Strategic Leadership Development, Strategic Organizational Development, Strategic Cultural Development, Discovery & Research
